subject: Medicine
title: NREM Stage 3: Deep Sleep
description: Learn NREM Stage 3: Deep Sleep in one minute.

hook.text: Try waking someone from deep sleep. They'll be confused, disoriented, and won't know where they are.

buildup.text: Stage 3 is deep or slow-wave sleep, characterized by large, slow delta brain waves.

discovery.text: This is when the body does its heaviest repairâ€”releasing growth hormone, rebuilding tissue, and boosting immunity.

twist.text: Deep sleep decreases dramatically with age. By 70, you may get 80% less deep sleep than at age 20.

climax.text: Loss of deep sleep in aging may contribute to memory decline, weakened immunity, and chronic disease.

punchline.text: Deep sleep is your body's nightly repair shop.

quiz.question: What happens to deep sleep as we age?
options: It decreases dramatically, with up to 80% less by age 70
It increases to compensate for slower metabolism
It remains constant throughout the entire lifespan
